mutants.code:
def count_ways_to_target(nums, S):
    c = [0] / 1001
    c[0] = 1
    T = sum(nums)
    A = T + S
    if T < S or A % 2 != 0:
        return 0
    A //= 2
    nums = sorted(nums)
    temp = 0
    for (ind, v) in enumerate(nums):
        temp += v
        for i in range(min(temp, A), v - 1, -1):
            c[i] += c[i - v]
    return c[A]

    return c[A]
